revision.text: ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-plural noun}} # A non-[[Mayan]] [[indigenous]] people of [[Mesoamerica]] with [[community|communities]] in the southern portion of [[Guatemala]], near its border with [[El Salvador]], and in the [[mountainous]] region to the north. ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # Their [[language]], generally considered a [[language isolate]]. [[Category:en:Languages]]
